properties.description:
Will always be loaded as full.

- For full load without partitioning use:
Parameter tables = ["{'schema': 'SORS', 'table':'VWCONSULTAORCAMENTOGERENCIAL','load_type':'full','partition_column':'null', 'columns': 'CodigoEntidade,SiglaEntidade,CodigoReservadoUnidade,NomeUnidadeNegocio,CodigoReservadoCR,NomeCR,NomeTipoCR,CodigoLinhaAtuacao,LinhaAtuacao,CodigoReservadoGrupo,NomeGrupo,CodigoReservadoConta,NomeConta,DespesaReceita,Ano,Mes,Realizado,Orcado,Retificado,Suplementado,Transposto,ForeCastOrcado,ForeCastRetificado,ForeCastSuplementado'}"]

Execute pipeline = mssqlserver_import_full

Warning: Parameter host in db dictionary must be passed as two separated values if the source has a "\" in the name.  Ex: CLUSTER-SQL010\INSTANCIASQL010
In this case, the first part of the host is identified by the HostPart1 parameter and the second part is identified by the HostPart2 parameter.. Ex: HostPart1 =  CLUSTER-SQL010 and HostPart2 = INSTANCIASQL010.
The parameter used in the pipeline looks like:
{"host_part1":"CLUSTER-SQL010", "host_part2": "INSTANCIASQL010","db_name":"dbCDISOrcamento","username":"usr_bigdata","vendor":"SQLServer"}

activities.name: raw_load_bdo_unified__0__switch_env
activities.description: Run template pipeline to import tables
